responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "875D68B44EFC649F74C61EB0C3A1D87F", "I don\'t like that you had to paint the farmlands red with the blood of these former Kaelar citizens. But we do our duty. I\'ll see to it that the field marshal and Avenmoor are informed so they can shout it across the Riverlands. Was their anything else?")
name: MADD_0005A_BDA_OrrikBlackwood_Phase02_13
